When a entire population is dictated by an army laws . It s called occupation , occupation is not only occupation of the land but it is worth it's to be under military rules and laws in your daily life. Now these Israeli soldiers are Hero, they bring to light a collective low moral of the Israeli society that is silent knowing what's really going on in the Judea and Samaria area and East Jerusalem, It is not necessarily an option to have 2 states .but what is necessary is that all people living on the same ground is being ruled by an unique civil entity.a country can be federated it s help to solve the demographic conflict by keeping the unity of the civil laws. If *Shovrim Shtika* went to look outside Israel it is because inside Israel corruption within the bureaucracy and legal system is High, just look what happened within the police and as well cases within the army and all level in all different mimistries.

Funny how as a business man for well over 40 years Trump not only got along with everyone in the business world but also got a long with so many politicians. Everyone had nothing but good things to say about him. Everyone knows that in business world you can't make your company grow or get contracts that you want/need if you are temperamental and have thin skin. Everyone knows that in business world if you want things done you have to get along with everyone even with people you despise. Now that Trump is running from president he is being depicted as thin skinned and temperamental. Give me a break!!! Corrupt politicians & biased media can take a good person and make him look like a monster and take a monster and make him look like an angel.
I'm stuck in that traffic

What exactly is """"playing God""""? Is saving lives playing God? Because maybe God intended them to die. Is inventing an airplane playing God? Because if God wanted us to fly, we would have evolved wings. Is being supportive of LGBT people and helping them cope in a hostile world playing God? Because if God wanted us all to be cis and hetero, we would be... oh wait, the fact that we're not all that way would suggest God wants some people to be different. So it's who wants to play God by, what? Beating transgender kids until they conform to the gender you say they are? So what if they commit suicide in a year or two or ten?
